41 const int MAX_OPENNI2_STREAMS = 2 * ONI_MAX_SENSORS;

43 //! Interface to video capture sources
44 struct OpenNiVideo2 : public VideoInterface, public VideoPropertiesInterface, public VideoPlaybackInterface
45 {
46 public:
47 
48  // Open all RGB and Depth streams from all devices
49  OpenNiVideo2(ImageDim dim=ImageDim(640,480), int fps=30);
50 
51  // Open streams specified
52  OpenNiVideo2(std::vector<OpenNiStreamMode>& stream_modes);
53 
54  // Open openni file
55  OpenNiVideo2(const std::string& filename);
56 
57  // Open openni file with certain params
58  OpenNiVideo2(const std::string& filename, std::vector<OpenNiStreamMode>& stream_modes);
59 
60  void UpdateProperties();
61 
62  void SetMirroring(bool enable);
63  void SetAutoExposure(bool enable);
64  void SetAutoWhiteBalance(bool enable);
65  void SetDepthCloseRange(bool enable);
66  void SetDepthHoleFilter(bool enable);
67  void SetDepthColorSyncEnabled(bool enable);
68  void SetRegisterDepthToImage(bool enable);
69  void SetPlaybackSpeed(float speed);
70  void SetPlaybackRepeat(bool enabled);
71 
72  ~OpenNiVideo2();
73 
74  //! Implement VideoInput::Start()
75  void Start();
76 
77  //! Implement VideoInput::Stop()
78  void Stop();
79 
80  //! Implement VideoInput::SizeBytes()
81  size_t SizeBytes() const;
82 
83  //! Implement VideoInput::Streams()
84  const std::vector<StreamInfo>& Streams() const;
85 
86  //! Implement VideoInput::GrabNext()
87  bool GrabNext( unsigned char* image, bool wait = true );
88 
89  //! Implement VideoInput::GrabNewest()
90  bool GrabNewest( unsigned char* image, bool wait = true );
91 
92  //! Implement VideoPropertiesInterface::Properties()
93  const json::value& DeviceProperties() const {
94  return device_properties;
95  }
96 
97  //! Implement VideoPropertiesInterface::Properties()
98  const json::value& FrameProperties() const {
99  return frame_properties;
100  }
101 
102  //! Implement VideoPlaybackInterface::GetCurrentFrameId
103  int GetCurrentFrameId() const;
104 
105  //! Implement VideoPlaybackInterface::GetTotalFrames
106  int GetTotalFrames() const ;
107 
108  //! Implement VideoPlaybackInterface::Seek
109  int Seek(int frameid);
110 
111  openni::VideoStream* GetVideoStream(int stream);
112 
113 protected:
114  void InitialiseOpenNI();
115  int AddDevice(const std::string& device_uri);
116  void AddStream(const OpenNiStreamMode& mode);
117  void SetupStreamModes();
118  void PrintOpenNI2Modes(openni::SensorType sensorType);
119  openni::VideoMode FindOpenNI2Mode(openni::Device &device, openni::SensorType sensorType, int width, int height, int fps, openni::PixelFormat fmt );
120 
121  int numDevices;
122  int numStreams;
123 
124  openni::Device devices[ONI_MAX_SENSORS];
125  OpenNiStreamMode sensor_type[ONI_MAX_SENSORS];
126 
127  openni::VideoStream video_stream[ONI_MAX_SENSORS];
128  openni::VideoFrameRef video_frame[ONI_MAX_SENSORS];
129 
130  std::vector<StreamInfo> streams;
131  size_t sizeBytes;
132 
133  json::value device_properties;
134  json::value frame_properties;
135  json::value* streams_properties;
136 
137  bool use_depth;
138  bool use_ir;
139  bool use_rgb;
140  bool depth_to_color;
141  bool use_ir_and_rgb;
142  bool fromFile;
143 
144  int current_frame_index;
145  int total_frames;
146 };
